short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'the cloud' with 'my arse', as well as 'cloud' with 'arse' in certain contexts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces the text 'the cloud' with 'my arse', as well as 'cloud' with 'arse' in certain contexts. This is a rework of the excellent "Cloud To Butt Plus" plugin but targeted at a British audience.
